content: Just got back to NYC, and the skyline is still a sight to see  This time, I'm here to shake things up in my career. Already hit up some old finance pals to see what's up.
raw_content: I'm back in NYC! The skyline is as mesmerizing as ever. But this time, I'm here to kickstart a new chapter in my career. Already reached out to some old contacts in the quant finance scene.

content: So I’m 22 now, living in the city that never sleeps. This past year's been a rollercoaster, but I've definitely grown. Today, I'm diving deep into tweaking my trading algorithms with some new AI stuff I've been picking up.
raw_content: Just turned 22 in the city that never sleeps. Reflecting on the past year, I see a path of growth despite the setbacks. Today, I'm focusing on refining my trading algorithms with a new AI tool I've been learning.
